trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class to authenticate <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator> 類別來驗證 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> 安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the user is authenticated the claims are added to identify the groups that the Windows user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者完成驗證時，將會加入用來識別 Windows 使用者所屬群組的宣告。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to get the groups the Windows user belongs to; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 Windows 使用者所屬的群組，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> class by specifying whether the groups that the Windows user belongs to are obtained when the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 指定當 Windows 使用者進行驗證時是否要取得該使用者所屬的群組，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.KerberosSecurityTokenAuthenticator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出指定的安全性權杖是否可由這個安全性權杖驗證程式進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="token" /> is a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken" /> security token; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是 <paramref name="token" /> 安全性權杖，則為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
